name: Event 6-
description: Greetings from IEEE UVCE! CodeStorm When life throws you a CodeStorm, pass all the test cases! CodeStorm is a competitive programming contest. Here, the participants are required to solve a series of problems over 2 rounds. These problems would challenge their problem solving skills and promote out-of-the box thinking. Round 1: Here a set of 5 problems would be given, each of varying degrees of difficulty. The problem solving skills and knowledge of the participants will be tested. Round 2: The qualifying contestants will make it to round two. The participants are required to solve a fun optimisation problem statement, and maximize their score. Cash Prize worth â‚¹6000 to be won! Ticket Price: â‚¹50 per person Team Size: 1-3 Date: 31st March, 2023 Mode: Online Registeration link Contact: Girish Bharadwaj: +91 74065 43569 Samyuktha Sridhar: +91 91085 62257 Shamanth GM: +91 82173 43931 Vishal Vinay Ram: +91 78923 78237

name: Event 8
description: FITT-IIT Delhi in association with Food Corporation of India(FCI) is inviting startups, individuals, and teams of innovators to solve the challenge related to supply chain, Logistics management and product design. FITT-IITD<>FCI Hackathon aims to support innovators to grow from the ideation stage to developing workable prototypes and minimum viable products for the use cases. Problem statement : Design an independent mechanical portable system to provide loading/unloading of foodgrains packed in gunny bags Prototyping grant up to 10 lakhs! Register Before 22nd April 2023 For more details, Reach out to: fitt.incubator@gmail.com Video of the existing method : Submit your idea

name: Event 10-
description: Working toward empowering these imperative notions of our society, MoE's Innovation Cell, AICTE along with Bureau of Police Research and Development (BPR&D)(MHA) and Indian Cyber crimeÂ Coordination CenterÂ (I4C)(MHA) have announced â€˜KAVACH-2023â€™ a unique national Hackathon to identify innovative concepts and technology solutions for addressing the security challenges of the 21st century faced by our intelligence agencies onÂ 16 Feb 2023. KAVACH-2023 is conceived to challenge Indiaâ€™s innovative minds to conceptualize ideas and framework in the domain of cyber security using artificial intelligence, deep learning, machine learning, automation, big data and cloud computing. KAVACH-2023 is a unique opportunity for higher institutional Students and Startups in India to submit their innovative ideas/concepts under the different problem statements. This event is going to be conducted in physical mode in two phaseâ€™s . During this 36 hours hackathon, scheduled in the month of July-23, selected youths from education institutions across the country will participate to offer strong, safe and effective technology solutions using their technical expertise and innovative skills. Total Prize money worth Rs. 20,00,000 is announced for the winning teams. This hackathon has 20 Problem statements related to the cyber security domain against which the innovative minds will be able to submit their ideas and compete against each other. We invite you to be a part of this National initiative and contribute towards building a safer nation. Register or visit

name: Event 11 -
description: The 'Creators of Metaverse' program allows students to learn about AR & VR and gain hands-on experience with industry-grade AR software in developing immersive solutions. It is a three phase workshop. Phase 1: The first phase is a 2-day workshop consisting of 2-hour sessions on Metaverse 101 and creating your first AR effect. Phase 2: The second phase is a 1-month micro-internship program with project-based knowledge checkpoints, live lectures, and mentor sessions. Phase 3: The final phase is the formation of alumni of the micro-internship cohorts into the 'Creators of Metaverse' community in chapters across the country, providing events and industry showcase opportunities. Kindly fill out the below form if interested

name: Event 13 -
description: National Inter-College Crossword Expedition (NICE-23) jointly organizing the event with National Institute of Industrial Engineering (NITIE), Mumbai. A contest involving solving of cryptic crossword clues. is scheduled to be held between March-August 2023 and registration has started on March 2023. The contest will be conducted through both online (initial rounds) and offline modes (zonal and final rounds).Â  The whole exercise, right from registration of participants and execution of the three rounds is to be anchored through Extra-C AICTE invites and encourages all affiliated institutions to take part in National Inter College Crossword Expedition 2023 (NICE-23). In this regard a circular & Guideline regarding NICE-23 programme containing registration process and another terms and condition for organizing NICE-23 for your ready reference. Please find the attached circular for your reference. PFA:Â https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_PbvXqouipFGXvNjg8Zp4exjRYY1vkMd/view?usp=share_linkÂ  Drive link

name: Event 14 -
description: Flipkart is back with the Season 3 of Flipkart Runway, the Early Career Program for Women Engineers that aims to provide them with an accelerated pathway to a successful career in technology. Runway aims at laying an early foundation for women in engineering by giving them early exposure to developmental opportunities through challenging & real-time problem statements, mentoring and networking opportunities. Eligibility & Round Details: Open to all women engineers who are in the 2nd year of their engineering course (either UG (2025 pass-outs)) or 3rd year of their dual degree courses (2025 pass-outs) any specialization (Full-Time Courses only) Rewards & Prizes: Selected students get to intern with Flipkart in the summer of 2023 PPI (Pre Placement Interview) opportunity for an internship at Flipkart in the pre-final year Opportunity to avail of Career Development & Interviewing skills workshop by Flipkart leaders application link

name: Event 15 -
description: Dear Student, Jamboree is hosting itâ€™s much awaited Education Fairâ€™ 2023 with over 30+ participating universities from the US, Canada and France. The pan-India fair is a chance for you to talk directly with university reps of top-ranking colleges including Arizona State University, University of Illinois Chicago, University of Arizona, University of New haven and more. What will you get? One-on-one Session With University Reps Profile Assessment for Scholarships Application Fee Waivers Free Profile Evaluation Session Option to Apply for Fallâ€™ 23 Q&A with Education Loan Experts While you are there, bring in your resume and experience in real-time how universities go through your profile. Learn everything from scholarship and loan related guidance to valuable insights that ensures your shortlist. If everyone going to study in US, France or Canada will be there, so should you, right? Register to secure your place at the Largest Education Fair. https://www.jamboreeindia.com/lp/page/edufair?Source=DEL%20BD3 Date: 3rd March 2023, Friday Time: 11 AM to 5 PM Venue: The Park Hotel, Parliament Street, New Delhi Register to secure your place at the Largest Education Fair.

name: Event 18 -
description: Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education ! As you are aware, the Gardens in Rashtrapati Bhavan are open to the public for about a month during February- March every year. To encourage and enable more people to visit and enjoy the beauty of rare varieties of flowers and plants in these gardens, it has been decided this year to open the Gardens of Rashtrapati Bhavan for two months, ie. from 31s January to 31st March 2023, under the outreach programme, "Udyan Utsav. 2023". For any further details/ information in the matter your office may contact the undersigned on Mobile No. 9205855997 and/or E-mail ID :- udyanutsav-rb@rb.nic.in Please find attached O.M and Instructions for your kind perusal. In view of the above, AICTE requests your Institution(s) to kindly disseminate this information among all the faculty members, Students, staff & others so they can take the benefits from this Udyan Utsav. PFA:

name: Event 19 -
description:
Dear Sir / Madam

Greetings!

India has assumed the G20 Presidency from December 1, 2022 to November 30, 2023.
   As part of G20 activities, the Directorate of International Affairs (DIA) - Nodal Officer G-20,
    GGSIPU is planning to organize a Case Study Challenge Competition titled
     "G-20 & Opportunities for Youth" for the students of GGSIP University on January 24, 2023.
       This will give an opportunity to our students to apply their skills towards 
       real world problems in a business setting.   The event shall be conducted 
       at University level culminating into an inter-university event.   

All the Participants shall be given the Participation Certificate and Winners  shall be awarded.

In this regard, It is requested to please circulate the above information with your students
 and request to encourage them to participate actively in the Case Study Competition.
   The entries are invited from all the students of GGSIP University by January 20, 2023
    through email on g20ipu@gmail.com 


With Warm Regards


Prof Vijita Singh Aggarwal
Director, International Affairs & G-20 Nodal Office
GGS Indraprastha University
Sector 16-C Dwarka, New Delhi 110078 (INDIA)
Mobile: 9718503820
Phone: +91-11-25302125

name: Event 25 -
description: Dear all, We are inviting you to attend the Inaugural Ceremony of to the 4th International Conference on Computing Informatics and Networks (ICCIN-2022) (https://iccin.co.in/) organized by the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Bhagwan Parshuram Institute of Technology, Delhi, India on December 15, 2022 at 9:30 AM Other informatic sessions may be of your interest are as follows: Keynote Talk -1 10:00 AM-11:00 AM Type-2 and Type-3 Fuzzy Systems and their Applications Speaker: Prof. Oscar Castillo (Tijuana Institute of Technology, Mexico) Special Talk 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM Application of AI in Agriculture Speaker: Prof Amit Prakash (GGSIP University, Delhi) Keynote Talk -2 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM A New Quantum Computer Speaker: Prof. Frank Wang (University of Kent, UK) Be a part of this conference and explore the current trends and new dimensions . link:
